metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5833 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the column_title function inwp-admin/includes/class-wp-media-list-table.php in WordPress before 4.5.3allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via acrafted attachment name, a different vulnerability than CVE-2016-5834.

criterions.comment: wordpress package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
